subHeaderPinkRect: Begin your journey of exploration through exciting and engaging scientific experiments generated by artificial intelligence.
physicsDescription: Do you want to understand the motion of objects around you? Why does light refract and sound propagate? Through inspiring and captivating experiments, you will explore the world of physics in interactive and exciting ways.
chemistryDescription: Do you want to explore the reasons behind the things we see and touch every day? Through simple and enjoyable experiments, you can understand how materials interact and transform from one form to another.
biologyDescription: Are you interested in uncovering the secrets of life around you? How does the human body function, along with its organs? Explore the realm of biology through fascinating and simple experiments, and learn how the bodies of living organisms operate.
astronomyDescription: Are you curious about the mysteries of the universe and the stars in the sky? Why do planets orbit and how does spacetime work? Discover the realm of astronomy and space through enjoyable and simplified experiments.
weWouldLikeToKnowYouBetter: We would like to know you better!
name: Your name
footer: All rights are reserved - Jihad Labs
toAddExpNote: To add experiment to favorities, please login
noFavorites: You can view your favorites here, after adding an experiment in the Experiments page
